Hi, thanks for sharing the nice project!

I'm not so good at asp.net, I just installed Kigg on new website and I got several issues, wish anyone can give me assistance

1. How I can add the Keyword, Title, Description?

2. How I can edit the footers?

New Kigg Website: http://www.Servefault.com

Thanks

 

Helen

Hi Helen,

In order to change Keywords, Title and Description you have to edit a web.config file. Find SiteTitle, MetaKeywords and MetaDescription and change them as you like.
Footer is defined in SiteTemplate.Master file (in  Web\View\Shared). It starts with <div id="footer">.

Regards,
Pawel
And another issue, How I can change the category name?

Categories are in Data.sql file (Database folder).
You will have to change them in file and insert those rows again to the database (alternatively you can try changing them in the DB directly).

Regards,
Pawel
I didn't try to insert the SQL database before, is it possible to use Visual Studio 2008 to insert?

And my website is hosted with webhost4life, their support team is already help me insert the data.sql into the Mssql 2005 server, is it possible to change the Category directly in the SQL database? They can support webbase sql admin

Yes, it is possible to change the data directly in SQL database. They need to change it in Category table. The categories are cached so your app will need to be restarted to see the effect.

Regards,
Pawel
